google_reviews.author: Kwame Mensah
google_reviews.review: This boutique hotel is a gem!  The rooms have been updated recently and the kitchen, bath, and living spaces are well provisioned.  While noise from a dancehall a block away can be an issue on Fri/Sat, things were quiet by 11 pm on my Thurs-Sun stay, with no street noise or bumps in the night from neighboring rooms.

owner_response.text: Fantastic - thank you for reviewing our place, Kwame! -Fred

google_reviews.author: Pam Orebaugh
google_reviews.review: The Hamlet Hotel is a must.  Would love to keep it "Our Little Secret" but will share.  It is comfortable, cozy and stylish.  The comforts of Home.  Spent 2 days and didn't want to leave.  The NightLife on Friday and Saturday nights can be a little LIVELY but the Hamlet provides earplugs.  This doesn't take away from the wonderful charm and comfort that the Hamlet provides.  We stayed in Suite 201 and look forward to staying in the other 3 suites available.  Looking forward to our next stay.

owner_response.text:
Pam - you are so sweet to take the time to provide your feedback, thank you! Of course, we are delighted that you enjoyed our unique Hamlet and that you and Bill experienced its charms along with the dynamics of our downtown neighborhood.  In the event we are fortunate to host you again, you may appreciate knowing that each of our four suites now also Include LectroFan white noise machines. We expect this can benefit our guests who choose to turn-in before some of the other kiddos 
Safe travels and please come back again, soon!

-Fred

google_reviews.author: Nicole Gurtler
google_reviews.review: I had never spent any time in Bellingham before, and found that this was the perfect place from which to explore. On top of the ideal location (right in the heart of downtown!) in a historic building, the suites are beautifully appointed and full of thoughtful touches.

owner_response.text: Thank you for your thoughtful review, Nicole - we certainly enjoyed hosting you! -Fred and Colleen Schacht

google_reviews.author: Heather Dauphiny
google_reviews.review: This is a wonderful spot in downtown Bellingham. Our hosts were amazing and easy to get a hold of with questions. The unit was clean and cozy and Fred and Colleen left a few little treats that just went above and beyond!

owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your review, Heather and thanks for being 5-Star guests! -Fred

summary.text:
Good

The Hamlet has gained a reputation for providing a comfortable and cozy atmosphere, with many users praising the boutique hotel experience. Several reviews highlight that the units are clean, stylish, and equipped with thoughtful amenities, creating a home-like feel. Guests appreciate the attention to detail, such as earplugs provided for the lively nightlife on weekends and the introduction of white noise machines in their suites, addressing noise concerns.

User feedback underscores the excellent communication from the hosts, who are described as amazing and accessible for inquiries. This responsiveness has contributed to a feeling of hospitality, enhancing the overall positive experience during their stays. The central location in downtown Bellingham has also been mentioned as ideal for exploring the area, thus appealing to visitors.
